messages.title: A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR OUR MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan to decrease waiting times for mental health care and increase staff training to provide better care.

issues.health: The NHS is under threat with Trump and Johnson. The Liberal Democrats emphasize the importance of mental health care and plan to improve services and reduce waiting times.

community.content: Mental health services have been overlooked for too long. To improve this, the Liberal Democrats have an ambitious plan to decrease waiting times and enhance the staff training.

endorsements.endorsement: Poll reveals majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.

quotes.text: Poll reveals majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.

examples: Four out of five people recognize mental health is as important as physical health, but only one out of five think the NHS treats it that way.
For too long, mental health has been overlooked.
If Boris Johnson remains as Prime Minister, things will only get worse for our NHS.
Donald Trump has made it clear that the NHS would be part of negotiating any trade deals with the US.
The NHS is under threat with Trump and Johnson.
